title: How I predict NBA games with 65%+ accuracy

hook.text:
I've been predicting NBA games at 65%+ accuracy. No gut feelings, no hot takes.

[On-screen: "PURE MATH WINS 🎯"]

Here's the exact system I use...

explanation.text:
Step 1: Calculate each team's average TUSG% (offensive control)
Step 2: Calculate each team's PVR (efficiency)
Step 3: Factor in pace adjustments
Step 4: Compare vs Vegas spread

[Show formula: Edge = 50 + (Home TUSG - Away TUSG) + (Home PVR - Away PVR) × 0.5]

When my model shows 65%+ edge AND disagrees with Vegas? That's a pick.

example.text:
Example: Team A has 42 TUSG + 25 PVR. Team B has 38 TUSG + 18 PVR.

[Show calculation: Edge = 50 + 4 + 3.5 = 57.5%]

Vegas has it even? My model says Team A wins 65% of the time. That's value.
